Admission.who can take admission: Any 10th and 12th or other equivalent passouts can be addmitted according to mirit list after 10th the diploma is of 3 years while after 12th or equivalent diploma is of 2 years
Admission.how to take admission: first enroll in maha dbt and the according to mirit list clgs will be allocated (as per your choice)
Admission.when it will start: tentative dates for addmission is after 10th result and direct second year 12 th student is done after 12 th result
Admission.Fees:
OPEN=7750 
 OBC/Ews=4750 
 SC/ST/VJNT/SBC=1750   (per year fee exam fees are exempted)

Hostel.who can take admission: Anyone of the clg can be addmited according to mirit list but direct second year students are not allowed they can apply only in 3 rd year
Hostel.Mess: It is included in hostel fees
Hostel.Facilites: 300 sqft room for 2 students along with a bed,fan,tabel and chair
Hostel.External appliances: Only chargers are allowed and for other things permission are needed to be taken from officials

Scholarship.who can apply: Any one from reserved category along with open whose annual income is less tha 8,00,000 RS
Scholarship.Document requirement: cast,income,domicile,allotment letter,addmission fee recipt,bank passbook zerox,adhar card zerox,ssc/hsc marksheet,previous year marksheet,declaration,Gap,Ration card zerox

Library.Timing: Open from 11 am to 5 pm (mon to sat) lunch break is from 2-3pm
Library.Book borrow period: It is of 15 days including the day when you borrow it
Library.Book bank: It is a library concept in which one can borrow multiple books for a year and you just have to pay 100 Rs

Courses.No data: Till now data is not available
